CustomField.formula: IF( OR( ( ISPICKVAL( Department__c , "Compliance") && (n2de__Time_to_action_mins__c <= 480)), ( ISPICKVAL( Department__c , "Zenefits Servicing") && (n2de__Time_to_action_mins__c <= 240)), ( ISPICKVAL( Department__c , "Billing") && (n2de__Time_to_action_mins__c <= 360)), ( ISPICKVAL( Department__c , "Single(k)") && (n2de__Time_to_action_mins__c <= 360))), True, False)
CustomField.label: Time to Action SLA Met
